AT.name: Kirby™: Power-Malpinsel
AT.description: Kirby wurde von der bösen Hexe Malia in einen Ball verwandelt! Zum Glück wurde dein Touchpen mit magischer Farbe gefüllt und du kannst Kirby durch die sieben Spielstufen führen, indem du farbenfrohe Regenbogen malst. Dieses von Kritikern gefeierte Spiel lieferte die Inspiration zum 2015 auf der Wii U™ erschienenen „Kirby™ und der Regenbogen-Pinsel“. Zeichne Linien und Rampen, um Power-Ups zu sammeln, zeichne Kreise, um Kirby zu beschleunigen, und doppeltippe auf Kirby, um ihn im Kampf gegen Feinde zu unterstützen und deren Fähigkeiten zu sammeln. Sammle Münzen, um geheime Funktionen freizuschalten!

AU.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
AU.description: Kirby has been transformed into a ball by the evil witch Drawcia! Fortunately, your stylus has been infused with magic paint. By drawing colourful rainbows, you can guide Kirby through the seven stages of this critically acclaimed game that inspired 2015's Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush on Wii U™. Draw lines and ramps to collect power-ups, draw loops to help him speed up, and double-tap on Kirby to help him fight enemies and collect their abilities. Collect medals to unlock secret features!

BG.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
BG.description: Kirby has been transformed into a ball by the evil witch Drawcia! Fortunately, your stylus has been infused with magic paint. By drawing colourful rainbows, you can guide Kirby through the seven stages of this critically acclaimed game that inspired 2015's Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush on Wii U™. Draw lines and ramps to collect power-ups, draw loops to help him speed up, and double-tap on Kirby to help him fight enemies and collect their abilities. Collect medals to unlock secret features!

BE.name: Kirby™ : Le Pinceau du Pouvoir
BE.description: Kirby a été transformé en boule par l'horrible Sorcière Crayona ! Heureusement pour lui, votre stylet a été enchanté par de la peinture magique. En dessinant des arcs-en-ciel colorés vous pouvez guider Kirby à travers sept stages dans ce jeu acclamé par la critique et qui a inspiré le jeu Kirby™ et le pinceau arc-en-ciel, sorti en 2015 sur Wii U™. Dessinez des lignes et des rampes pour obtenir des pouvoirs spéciaux, dessinez des cercles pour faire accélérer Kirby et touchez le deux fois pour l'aider à combattre les ennemis et récolter leurs compétences. Ramassez les médailles pour débloquer des fonctionnalités secrètes !

movies.name: Kirby™ : Le Pinceau du Pouvoir : vidéo

ES.name: Kirby™: El pincel del poder
ES.description: ¡La malvada bruja Drawcia ha transformado a Kirby en una bola! Por suerte, tu lápiz está lleno de tinta mágica. Dibuja arcoíris coloridos para conducir a Kirby a lo largo de los siete niveles de este juego tan aclamado por la crítica y que sirvió como inspiración para Kirby™ y el Pincel Arcoíris para Wii U™, lanzado en el 2015. Dibuja líneas y rampas para conseguir poderes especiales, traza curvas para ayudar a Kirby a ganar velocidad, y tócalo dos veces para ayudarle a enfrentarse a los enemigos y a hacerse con sus habilidades. ¡Colecciona medallas para desbloquear funciones secretas!

movies.name: Kirby™: El pincel del poder: Vídeo

IT.name: Kirby™: l'Oscuro Disegno
IT.description: Kirby è stato trasformato in una palla dalla malvagia strega Pigmenta! Per fortuna, il tuo stilo è stato infuso con dell'inchiostro magico. Disegna arcobaleni colorati per guidare Kirby attraverso i sette livelli di questo gioco che ha avuto un grande successo di critica e che ha ispirato Kirby™ e il pennello arcobaleno, uscito nel 2015 per Wii U™. Disegna linee e archi per ottenere potenziamenti, disegna cerchi per aiutarlo ad andare più veloce, e dai dei doppi colpetti a Kirby per aiutarlo a sconfiggere i nemici e ottenere le loro abilità. Inoltre, colleziona le medaglie per sbloccare contenuti segreti!

NL.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
NL.description: Kirby is in een bal veranderd door de boze heks Drawcia! Gelukkig is je stylus gevuld met magische verf. Door kleurige regenbogen te tekenen, leid je Kirby door de zeven levels van dit populaire spel dat de inspiratie was voor Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush voor de Wii U™ uit 2015. Schets lijnen en schansen om power-ups te verzamelen, schets cirkels om hem sneller te laten gaan, en tik twee keer snel achter elkaar op Kirby om hem te helpen tegen vijanden te vechten en hun vaardigheden te verzamelen. Verzamel medailles om geheime functies vrij te spelen!

NZ.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
NZ.description: Kirby has been transformed into a ball by the evil witch Drawcia! Fortunately, your stylus has been infused with magic paint. By drawing colourful rainbows, you can guide Kirby through the seven stages of this critically acclaimed game that inspired 2015's Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush on Wii U™. Draw lines and ramps to collect power-ups, draw loops to help him speed up, and double-tap on Kirby to help him fight enemies and collect their abilities. Collect medals to unlock secret features!

PL.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
PL.description: Kirby has been transformed into a ball by the evil witch Drawcia! Fortunately, your stylus has been infused with magic paint. By drawing colourful rainbows, you can guide Kirby through the seven stages of this critically acclaimed game that inspired 2015's Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush on Wii U™. Draw lines and ramps to collect power-ups, draw loops to help him speed up, and double-tap on Kirby to help him fight enemies and collect their abilities. Collect medals to unlock secret features!

PT.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
PT.description: O Kirby foi transformado numa bola pela bruxa malvada Drawcia! Felizmente, o teu stylus está munido com tinta mágica. Ao desenhares arco-íris, poderás guiar o Kirby através dos sete níveis deste jogo aclamado pela crítica, que inspirou o jogo de 2015 Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush para a Wii U™. Desenha linhas e rampas para apanhares power-ups, loops para ajudares o Kirby a ganhar velocidade, e toca-lhe duas vezes para o ajudares a enfrentar os inimigos e absorver as suas habilidades. Coleciona medalhas para desbloqueares segredos!

RU.name: Kirby™: Power Paintbrush
RU.description: Зловещая ведьма Drawcia превратила Kirby в мячик! На счастье, ваш стилус наполнен магической краской. Рисуя разноцветные радуги, вы помогаете Kirby в его путешествии через семь уровней этой признанной критиками игры, которая послужила вдохновением при создании Kirby™ and the Rainbow Paintbrush (2015) для системы Wii U™. Рисуйте линии и уступы для того, чтобы собирать улучшения, а также петли для ускорения. Касайтесь Kirby дважды для того, чтобы помочь ему сражаться с врагами и собирать их способности. Также собирайте медали для того, чтобы открывать секреты!
